## Interactive R Analysis

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: true

# Example: Linear regression model
set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(100)
y <- 2 * x + rnorm(100)
model <- lm(y ~ x)

# Display coefficients
cat("Intercept:", round(coef(model)[1], 3), "\n")
cat("Slope:", round(coef(model)[2], 3), "\n")
cat("R-squared:", round(summary(model)$r.squared, 3))
```
